statements: DELETE FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE field_id = 1 AND crop_name = 'Wheat';
DELETE FROM Field WHERE field_name = 'Wheat Field';
DELETE FROM Field WHERE field_id = 1 AND size_acres > 50;
DELETE FROM CropRotationSchedule WHERE planting_date < '2022-01-01' AND rotation_number >= 3;
